settings.title: Returns
settings.product_information: You can return items according to our return policy

settings.intro_text:
You will receive a confirmation by email shortly after placing your order. Please re-check your shipping address for mistakes. Extra shipping cost as a result of a wrong address will be for the client's costs.

*We are currently not able to ship our products to the UK. In the meantime, we are doing our best to make this possible again as soon as we can.
